summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5097 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12647 lux), cloud levels (up 1675 m), feels like temperature (up 5.3°C), and outside temperature (up 4.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air moisture should feel ok. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
